  • titan_pylib.others.fast_io

titan_pylib.others.fast_io のソースコード

 1import io, os
 2


[ドキュメント]
 3class FastIO():
 4
 5  # https://recruit.gmo.jp/engineer/jisedai/blog/python_standard_io_with_bytesio/
 6
 7  input_buf = io.BytesIO()
 8  output_buf = io.BytesIO()
 9  num_line = 0
10  BUFSIZE = (1<<18)-1
11


[ドキュメント]
12  @classmethod
13  def input(cls):
14    pointer = cls.input_buf.tell()
15    while cls.num_line == 0:
16      byte_data = os.read(0, cls.BUFSIZE)
17      cls.num_line = byte_data.count(b'\n') + (not byte_data)
18      cls.input_buf.seek(0, 2)
19      cls.input_buf.write(byte_data)
20    cls.input_buf.seek(pointer)
21    cls.num_line -= 1
22    return cls.input_buf.readline().decode().rstrip()


23


[ドキュメント]
24  @classmethod
25  def buf_input(cls):
26    pointer = cls.input_buf.tell()
27    while cls.num_line == 0:
28      byte_data = os.read(0, cls.BUFSIZE)
29      cls.num_line = byte_data.count(b"\n") + (not byte_data)
30      cls.input_buf.seek(0, 2)
31      cls.input_buf.write(byte_data)
32    cls.input_buf.seek(pointer)
33    cls.num_line -= 1
34    return cls.input_buf.readline()


35


[ドキュメント]
36  @classmethod
37  def write(cls, *args, sep=' ', end='\n', flush=False):
38    for i in range(len(args)-1):
39      cls.output_buf.write(str(args[i]).encode())
40      cls.output_buf.write(sep.encode())
41    if args:
42      cls.output_buf.write(str(args[-1]).encode())
43    cls.output_buf.write(end.encode())
44    if flush:
45      cls.flush()


46


[ドキュメント]
47  @classmethod
48  def flush(cls):
49    os.write(1, cls.output_buf.getvalue())
50    cls.output_buf.truncate(0)
51    cls.output_buf.seek(0)




52
53buf_input = FastIO.buf_input
54input = FastIO.input
55write = FastIO.write
56flush = FastIO.flush
